Package io.jkaamer.cdpn.compilerphases

Class Lexer

java.lang.Object
io.jkaamer.cdpn.compilerphases.Lexer
public final class Lexer extends Object
Lexer.java A lexeme is a sequence of characters in the source program that matches the pattern for a token and is identified by the lexical analyzer as an instance of that token.
